unnormalised: For folks looking for cardiologists in Delhi, Dr. Rajesh Sharma at AIIMS and Dr. Khan at Fortis are highly recommended, especially if you need an ECG or echo done urgently; remember to book appointments well in advance cos waiting times can be upto 2 weeks sometimes.
normalised: For folks looking for cardiologists in Delhi, Doctor Rajesh Sharma at A-I-I-M-S and Doctor Khan at Fortis are highly recommended, especially if you need an E-C-G or echo done urgently; remember to book appointments well in advance because waiting times can be up to two weeks sometimes.
